section.name: Agent M. Bean
section.p: Agent M. Bean is the agency's top management agent!

Agent M. Bean is a JMX agent that acts as an MBean application launcher. It includes a lightweight JMX microkernel J2SE application server for hot-deploying MBeans. A variety of MBeans are provided (including IRC and JMS adaptors!) for general consumption.
Requires Java 1.4 (uses Java 5 API if available, some MBeans will work with pre-1.4 JREs).
